resources.string: This app is your goto source for connection all your editorial staff. When out on the field it is imperative that the contact paths are short and immediate. A breaking story event when you\'re out of the office will no longer lead to delays in covering it, due to slow communication Put together groups for research, field work and strategy. Communicate through voice, video or IM. Update roles on the fly. Organize the work in one simple app allows for full focus on your work! Notice any bugs? Please send a note to errors@example.com. Click next to see upcoming features for this app!

Upcoming features

  • Send email to a staff member by clicking email address!
  • Change roles on the go!
  • Create groups. For instance, sort your editorial staff by role!
  • Instant messaging!

    • ...more to come!
